charinfo.name: Maki (S)
charinfo.description: Maki (S) is a kunoichi of the Hidden Sand Village and the student of Pakura. Maki (S) is also a member of the Ninja Alliance Sealing Squad.

abilities.name: Weighted Net Scroll
abilities.description: Maki (S) uses Weighted Net Scroll gaining 50% damage reduction for 1 turn. If any enemy uses a new skill on Maki (S) their physical and melee skills will be stunned the following turn. This effect ignores invulnerability. This skill is invisible.

abilities.name: Humidified Cloth
abilities.description: Using Humidified Cloth Maki (S) deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy. That enemy's offensive skills will be stunned for 1 turn.

abilities.name: Binding Cloth
abilities.description: Maki (S) uses Binding Cloth on one enemy stunning their chakra and ranged skills for 2 turns. Melee skills will deal an additional 5 damage to the target of this skill while it is in effect.

abilities.name: Cloth Shelter
abilities.description: This skill makes Maki (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.
